text:
Reside | Software Engineer, QA Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Fulltime | ONSITE

Reside is building a modern real estate brokerage, with the aim of unseating dinosaur brokerages like Remax and Coldwell-Banker. We just closed Series A a few weeks ago and are looking to grow our engineering team from 3 -> 10. We use React, Firebase, and Node. Reside is committed to creating an inclusive and diverse company.

Interview process: screening phone call, then 4 hour onsite.

Software Engineer: http://grnh.se/3aytm11

QA Test Engineer: http://grnh.se/teo8j21

Feel free to reach out to me directly, chris@residenetwork.com
